root.title: Failure By Design
root.lyrics:

We don't believe in filler, baby If I could I'd sit this out
(This is over when I say it's over) This is a lesson in procrastination I kill myself because I'm so frustrated And every single second that I put it off Means another lonely night I gotta race the clock (I ignore it and it ignores me too) Let's say we go and crash your car And every time I leave you go and lock the door So I walk myself picking at a chip on my shoulder I'm another day late and one year older It's failure by design
